name: Word Battle with Amigos
description:
Race against the clock in this highly addicting word game!

Rack up points & huge bonuses as you test your typing skills against the timer, but be careful... any mistakes will cost you points!.

You can play two modes! Play offline anytime or online against your friends and random opponents!

Download Word Battle now!

*Please leave a review if you enjoy this game!*
*We cannot reply to reviews on the AppStore so please email us at apprepublicllc@gmail.com for support*
